com.totalcross.knowcode.parse

Class XmlContainerRelativeLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • totalcross.ui.gfx.GfxSurface
      • totalcross.ui.Control
        • totalcross.ui.Container
          • com.totalcross.knowcode.parse.XmlContainerLayout
            • com.totalcross.knowcode.parse.XmlContainerRelativeLayout

  • public class XmlContainerRelativeLayout
extends XmlContainerLayout
    XmlContainerRelativeLayout is responsible to parse a RelativeLayout Android XML to a Container Totalcross.

    This class works together with the abstract class XmlContainerLayout and it's responsible to create all Controls from the XML components. RelativeLayout is a view group that displays child views in relative positions.

    XmlContainerRelativeLayout is instantiated automatically, the XmlContainerFactory class reads the type of XML layout and instantiates the corresponding layout class.
